text: Paul Murray Fleiss, M.D. (September 8, 1933 â€“ July 19, 2014) was an American pediatrician and author. He was known for his unconventional medical views. He was the father of television personality and former madam Heidi Fleiss. He was born in Detroit, Michigan. Fleiss, who was of Jewish descent, died in Los Angeles, California from respiratory failure, aged 80. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American physicians Category:Deaths from respiratory failure Category:Disease-related deaths in Los Angeles Category:Jewish American scientists Category:Scientists from Detroit
title: Paul M. Fleiss
